34 
36 class MousePicker{
37 public:
38  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
41 
43  template<size_t N, typename OutType>
44  static void GetChannelId(uint32_t id, OutType* outColor) {
45  static_assert(N == 3 || N == 4, "Must have three or four channels");
46 
47  if constexpr (N == 3) {
48  static uint32_t middleMask = 0x00FF00;
49  static uint32_t leftMask = 0x0000FF;
50  outColor[2] = OutType(id >> 16); // Shift 16 bits to get most significant bytes
51  outColor[1] = OutType((middleMask & id) >> 8); // Shift 8 bits and mask to get middle bytes
52  outColor[0] = OutType(leftMask & id);
53 
54  if (outColor[2] > 255) {
55  Logger::Throw("Error, more than 2^24 scene objects not supported");
56  }
57  }
58  else {
59  static uint32_t middleRightMask = 0x00FF0000;
60  static uint32_t middleLeftMask = 0x0000FF00;
61  static uint32_t leftMask = 0x000000FF;
62  outColor[3] = OutType(id >> 24); // Shift 24 bits to get most significant bytes
63  outColor[2] = OutType((middleRightMask & id) >> 16); // Shift 16 bits and mask to get middle bytes
64  outColor[1] = OutType((middleLeftMask & id) >> 8); // Shift 8 bits and mask to get middle bytes
65  outColor[0] = OutType(leftMask & id);
66 
67  if (outColor[3] > 255) {
68  Logger::Throw("Error, more than 2^32 scene objects not supported");
69  }
70  }
71  }
72 
73  template<size_t N, typename OutType>
74  static Vector<OutType, N> GetChannelId(uint32_t id) {
75  Vector<OutType, N> channelId = Vector<OutType, N>::EmptyVector();
76  GetChannelId<N, OutType>(id, channelId.array().data());
77  return channelId;
78  }
79 
81  template<size_t N, typename ColorType>
82  static uint32_t GetColorId(ColorType* color) {
83  static_assert(N == 3 || N == 4, "Must have three or four channels");
84 
85  if constexpr (N == 3) {
86  return (color[2] << 16) + (color[1] << 8) + (color[0]);
87  }
88  else {
89  return (color[3] << 24) + (color[2] << 16) + (color[1] << 8) + (color[0]);
90  }
91  }
92

100  MousePicker();
101  virtual ~MousePicker();

121

132  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
135 
137  void getPixelColor(Vector<int, 4>& outColor, const Vector3& widgetPos, const Camera& camera, const MainRenderer& renderer, uint32_t attachmentIndex, uint32_t sampleHalfWidth = 0);
138 
140  void getPixelColor(Vector4& outColor, const Vector3& widgetPos, const Camera& camera, const MainRenderer& renderer, uint32_t attachmentIndex, uint32_t sampleHalfWidth = 0);
141
